name: Infinite Faller
description:
This is a prototype for Infinite Faller, a game I built in unity using some assets I made myself. Please not that this is very much a work in progress and other elements will be added to the game, such as enemies and different levels.

Controls:

  1. Arrow keys to move.
  2. Space to boost.
  3. 'R' to restart after dying.
  4. While playing, press the three vertical dots to go back to the main menu.
